A Mirror Making All Things Clear, A Presentation of Signs and Reasonings

An introductory textbook in the Drepung Loseling study programme.

Tsongkhapa’s Praise for Dependent Relativity

Tsongkhapa’s especial emphasis on dependent arising gave a new turn to the interpretation of Buddhist philosophy, in particular to the philosophy of the Middle Way school.

Read more »

Song of the Stages of the Path

Tsongkhapa set out all the stages of the path to enlightenment extremely clearly and methodically in detailed prose works.

Geshe Losel is associated with The International Mahayana Institute (IMI) and a recognised teacher within the FPMT
